attribute.name: logFileSizeLimit
attribute.description: The maximum size of the JMX Agent log file; a value (in megabytes) in the range 0..1000000.

attribute.name: logDiskSpaceLimit
attribute.description: The maximum disk space to allocate for logging; a value (in megabytes) in the range 0..1000000.

attribute.name: logFile
attribute.description: The name and path of this Agent's log file.

attribute.name: logLevel
attribute.description: A keyword or integer that defines the minimum level of alerts to be written to the log - for example, only those alerts that are at level WARNING or higher.

attribute.name: autoConnect
attribute.description: If true, the JMX Agent will automatically connect to the distributed system when the Agent is started. The distributed system is specified by the following arguments: mcast-port, mcast-address, locators, remote-command. You can specify these arguments on the agent command line or in the Agent properties file.

attribute.name: connected
attribute.description: True if this Agent is connected to a distributed system.

attribute.name: propertyFile
attribute.description: Name and path of this Agent's properties file. Identical to the argument on the agent command line.

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: The Agent's version.

attribute.name: systemId
attribute.description: A string that describes the associated distributed system.

attribute.name: mcastAddress
attribute.description: Multicast address of the associated distributed system.

attribute.name: mcastPort
attribute.description: Multicast port of the associated distributed system.

attribute.name: locators
attribute.description: List of locators for connecting to the distributed system. Each locator is uniquely identified by the host on which it is running and the port on which it is listening.

attribute.name: membershipPortRange
attribute.description: The allowed range of UDP ports for use in forming an unique membership identifier.

attribute.name: bindAddress
attribute.description: An IP address that the JMX Agent uses to communicate with members of the distributed system. On a multi-homed host - a machine with multiple network cards - you must explicitly specify the bind address.

attribute.name: sslEnabled
attribute.description: Indicates whether to use the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol for communication between members of this distributed system. Valid values are "true" and "false". A "true" setting requires the use of locators.

attribute.name: sslProtocols
attribute.description: A space-separated list of the valid SSL protocols for this connection. You can specify "any" to use any protocol that is enabled by default in the configured Java Secure Sockets Extension (JSSE) provider.

attribute.name: sslCiphers
attribute.description: A space-separated list of the valid SSL ciphers for this connection. You can specify "any" to use any ciphers that are enabled by default in the configured JSSE provider.

attribute.name: sslAuthenticationRequired
attribute.description: Indicates whether to require SSL authentication for communication between members of the distributed system. Valid values are "true" and "false".

attribute.name: sslProperties
attribute.description: The SSL vendor properties to use for the distributed system.

operation.name: addSSLProperty
operation.description: Add an SSL vendor property with the specified key and value.

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: Property key

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Property value

operation.name: removeSSLProperty
operation.description: Remove the specified SSL vendor property.

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: Property key

operation.name: getLog
operation.description: Display the tail of the Agent's log file.

operation.name: stop
operation.description: Stop the Agent after closing all managed resources

operation.name: saveProperties
operation.description: Persist the Agent's current configuration to its properties file

operation.name: connectToSystem
operation.description: Connect to the distributed system described by this Agent. Returns the ObjectName of the corresponding DistributedSystem MBean.

operation.name: disconnectFromSystem
operation.description: Disconnect from the currently connected distributed system.

operation.name: manageDistributedSystem
operation.description: Return the ObjectName of the currently connected distributed system. If not connected, return null.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: A string that uniquely identifies this distributed system.

attribute.name: systemName
attribute.description: Display name of the distributed system

attribute.name: remoteCommand
attribute.description: A default remote command prefix to use for command invocation on remote machines.

attribute.name: alertLevel
attribute.description: Minimum level for alerts to be delivered to listeners. Should be one of: WARNING, ERROR, SEVERE, OFF. It is not case-sensitive.

attribute.name: mcastAddress
attribute.description: Multicast address of this distributed system.

attribute.name: mcastPort
attribute.description: Multicast port of this distributed system.

attribute.name: locators
attribute.description: List of locators for connecting to this distributed system. Each locator is uniquely identified by the host on which it is running and the port on which it is listening.

attribute.name: membershipPortRange
attribute.description: The allowed range of UDP ports for use in forming an unique membership identifier.

attribute.name: refreshIntervalForStatAlerts
attribute.description: The interval (in seconds) between auto-polling for checking whether the Stat has exceeded a threshold for which the Stat Alert Definition is defined.

attribute.name: refreshInterval
attribute.description: The interval (in seconds) between auto-polling for updating AdminDistributedSystem constituents including SystemMember and StatisticResource. This applies only to the default interval set when the resource is created. This interval is read-only and retains the value set when the Agent config is created

attribute.name: canPersistStatAlertDefs
attribute.description: Indicates whether Statistics Alert definitions could be persisted across runs/sessions of the JMX Agent.

attribute.name: missingPersistentMembers
attribute.description: Retrieve the set of persistent files that the existing members are waiting for.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.member.joined
notification.description: A GemFire manager, cache, or other member has joined this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.member.left
notification.description: A GemFire manager, cache, or other member has left the distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.member.crashed
notification.description: A member of this distributed system has crashed instead of leaving cleanly.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.alert
notification.description: A member of this distributed system has generated an alert.

operation.name: waitToBeConnected
operation.description: Wait for the connection to the distributed system to be established

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Number of milliseconds to wait to be connected

operation.name: start
operation.description: Start all locators defined for this distributed system.

operation.name: stop
operation.description: Stop all locators defined for this distributed system.

operation.name: manageDistributionLocator
operation.description: Creates a new distribution locator that is ready to configure and start

operation.name: manageDistributionLocators
operation.description: Return an array of JMX ObjectNames for all locators known to this distributed system.

operation.name: manageCacheVm
operation.description: Create a new CacheVm MBean (that is, make this distributed system aware of a cache server that has not been started ).

operation.name: manageCacheVms
operation.description: Return an array of JMX ObjectNames for all cache vms known to this distributed system.

operation.name: manageCacheServer
operation.description: Create a new CacheVm MBean (that is, make this distributed system aware of a cache vm that has not been started ). This action is deprecated as of 5.7 use manageCacheVm instead.

operation.name: manageCacheServers
operation.description: Return an array of JMX ObjectNames for all cache vms known to this distributed system. This action is deprecated as of 5.7 use manageCacheVm instead.

operation.name: manageSystemMemberApplications
operation.description: Return an array of JMX ObjectNames for all applications that are members of this distributed system.

operation.name: monitorGemFireHealth
operation.description: Return the ObjectName for the GemFireHealth MBean.

operation.name: displayMergedLogs
operation.description: Combine the tails of all system members' logs into a merged log, with the entries ordered by timestamp.

operation.name: getLicense
operation.description: Display GemFire licensing information.

operation.name: getLatestAlert
operation.description: Display the most recent system alert.

operation.name: createDistributionLocator
operation.description: Create a DistributionLocator MBean. The parameters specify the locator's host machine, the port on which it listens, the working directory hosting the locator, and product directory used by the locator.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Host machine for the Locator

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port for the Locator to listen on

parameter.name: workingDirectory
parameter.description: The working directory hosting the Locator

parameter.name: productDirectory
parameter.description: The GemFire product directory used by the Locator

operation.name: manageSystemMember
operation.description: Return the ObjectName for the SystemMemberMBean representing the specified distributed member or null if the member is not found.

parameter.name: distributedMember
parameter.description: The distributed member to manage

operation.name: getAllStatAlertDefinitions
operation.description: Return an array of all available Stat Alert Definitions objects.

operation.name: updateAlertDefinition
operation.description: Update/Add an Admin Stat Alert Definition to the Aggregator. Sends the updated definition to all the Managers/Members.

parameter.name: alertDefinition
parameter.description: The Admin Stat Alert Definition to be updated/added to the Aggregator

operation.name: removeAlertDefinition
operation.description: Remove an Admin Stat Alert Definition from the Aggregator and all the Managers/Members.

parameter.name: defId
parameter.description: The unique id of the Admin Stat Alert Definition to be removed from the Aggregator

operation.name: isAlertDefinitionCreated
operation.description: Check whether the alert definition is already created.

parameter.name: alertDefinition
parameter.description: The Admin Stat Alert Definition to be checked

operation.name: revokePersistentMember
operation.description: Indicate to the distributed system that persistent files have been lost.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The host of the members to revoke. If null, it will match all hosts

parameter.name: directory
parameter.description: The directory on the members to revoke. If null, it will match all directories

operation.name: shutDownAllMembers
operation.description: Shutting down all members with cache in the distributed system gracefully.

operation.name: shutDownAllMembers
operation.description: Shutting down all members with cache in the distributed system gracefully.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: The amount of time to wait (in milliseconds) for the shutdown all to complete.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: A string that uniquely identifies the application within the distributed system.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The application-defined member name.

attribute.name: host
attribute.description: The host machine on which this application is running.

attribute.name: refreshInterval
attribute.description: The interval (in seconds) between auto-refreshes of this application;s configuration attributes, as defined in the gemfire.properties file. To disable the JMX Timer service's auto-refresh feature, set this attribute to zero or less. Effective 6.0, any changes to this parameter wil not affect the current refreshInterval. To change the refreshInterval use AdminDistributedSystem.refreshInterval

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: Display GemFire version information.

attribute.name: hasCache
attribute.description: Does the system member host a GemFire Cache?

attribute.name: distributedMember
attribute.description: Distributed membership identity.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.created
notification.description: A cache got created on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.closed
notification.description: A cache is closed on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.region.created
notification.description: A region is created in a cache on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.region.lost
notification.description: A region was removed from a cache on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.client.joined
notification.description: A cache client established a connection with a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.client.left
notification.description: A cache client gracefully closed a connection with a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.client.crashed
notification.description: A cache client crashed and abruptly lost connection with a member of this distributed system.

operation.name: getRoles
operation.description: Get the membership roles filled by this member.

operation.name: getLog
operation.description: Display the main log for this system member.

operation.name: getLicense
operation.description: Display GemFire licensing information.

operation.name: manageCache
operation.description: Create a SystemMemberCache MBean for this application.

operation.name: manageStats
operation.description: Create a StatisticResource MBean for each statistic resource in this member.

operation.name: manageStat
operation.description: Create a StatisticResource MBean for each statistic resource in this member, given the underlying Statistics Type name.

parameter.name: statisticsTypeName
parameter.description: Name of the underlying Statistics Type eg. DistributionStats

operation.name: refreshConfig
operation.description: Refresh configuration attributes for this application, using the gemfire.properties file.

operation.name: getConfiguration
operation.description: Returns the current configuration attributes for this application, using the gemfire.properties file.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The JMX ObjectName of this statistic resource.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Description of this statistic resource.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Classification type of this statistic resource.

attribute.name: owner
attribute.description: Name of the source process.

attribute.name: refreshInterval
attribute.description: The interval (in seconds) between auto-refreshes of statistical information. To turn off the JMX Timer service's auto-refresh feature, set this attribute to zero or less. If you're concerned about system performance, leave this set to zero. Effective 6.0, any changes to this parameter wil not affect the current refreshInterval. To change the refreshInterval use AdminDistributedSystem.refreshInterval

operation.name: refresh
operation.description: Refresh values of statistics.

operation.name: getStatistics
operation.description: Returns a current snapshot of statistics.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Id of the distribution locator.

attribute.name: host
attribute.description: The host machine on which this locator is running.

attribute.name: workingDirectory
attribute.description: The current working directory of the locator.

attribute.name: productDirectory
attribute.description: The location of the GemFire installation used to run this locator.

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: The port on which this locator is listening: a value in the range 0..65535.

attribute.name: bindAddress
attribute.description: The interface address to which the locator binds.

attribute.name: running
attribute.description: True if this locator is running.

operation.name: start
operation.description: Start this distribution locator.

operation.name: waitToStart
operation.description: Wait for the distribution locator to start

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Number of milliseconds to wait to start

operation.name: waitToStop
operation.description: Wait for the distribution locator to stop

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Number of milliseconds to wait to stop

operation.name: stop
operation.description: Stop this distribution locator.

operation.name: getLog
operation.description: Display the tail of the locator service's log.

operation.name: remove
operation.description: Remove this distribution locator.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the Cache

attribute.name: closed
attribute.description: True if this cache has been closed.

attribute.name: lockTimeout
attribute.description: Seconds that a cache operation will wait to obtain a distributed lock lease.

attribute.name: lockLease
attribute.description: The length, in seconds, of distributed lock leases obtained by this cache.

attribute.name: searchTimeout
attribute.description: Seconds that a cache get operation can spend searching for a value before it times out.

attribute.name: upTime
attribute.description: Seconds that this cache has been open.

attribute.name: rootRegionNames
attribute.description: A set of the names of each root region currently in this cache.

attribute.name: server
attribute.description: Is this a cache server?

operation.name: getSnapshot
operation.description: Get Member Cache Status

operation.name: getRegionSnapshot
operation.description: Get Member Cache's Region Snapshot

operation.name: manageRegion
operation.description: Creates a SystemMemberRegion MBean for the region with the specified path.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Full path of region to create an mbean for.

operation.name: getStatistics
operation.description: Returns a current snapshot of cache statistics.

operation.name: refresh
operation.description: Updates each attribute in this MBean.

operation.name: manageBridgeServer
operation.description: Creates a new, unstarted bridge server for the cache. Deprecated as of 5.7 use manageCacheServer instead.

operation.name: manageBridgeServers
operation.description: Returns the names of the MBeans for the cache's bridge servers. Deprecated as of 5.7 use manageCacheServer instead.

operation.name: manageCacheServer
operation.description: Creates a new, unstarted cache server for the cache

operation.name: manageCacheServers
operation.description: Returns the names of the MBeans for the cache's cache servers

mbean.name: SystemMemberRegion
mbean.description: View of a GemFire system member cache's region

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name (not the full-path) of this region.

attribute.name: fullPath
attribute.description: The full path name of this region

attribute.name: userAttribute
attribute.description: Description of the region's user attribute object.

attribute.name: cacheLoader
attribute.description: Description of the region's cache loader.

attribute.name: cacheWriter
attribute.description: Description of the region's cache writer.

attribute.name: evictionAttributes
attribute.description: Description of the region's eviction attributes.

attribute.name: cacheListener
attribute.description: Description of the region's cache listener. This attribute is deprecated as of 6.0. Use getCacheListeners method instead.

attribute.name: keyConstraint
attribute.description: Name of the class that keys in this region are constrained to be

attribute.name: regionTimeToLiveTimeLimit
attribute.description: This region's time to live time limit.

attribute.name: regionTimeToLiveAction
attribute.description: This region's time to live action.

attribute.name: entryTimeToLiveTimeLimit
attribute.description: This region's entry time to live time limit.

attribute.name: entryTimeToLiveAction
attribute.description: This region's entry time to live action.

attribute.name: regionIdleTimeoutTimeLimit
attribute.description: This region's idle timeout time limit.

attribute.name: regionIdleTimeoutAction
attribute.description: This region's idle timeout action.

attribute.name: entryIdleTimeoutTimeLimit
attribute.description: This region's entry idle timeout time limit.

attribute.name: entryIdleTimeoutAction
attribute.description: This region's entry idle timeout action.

attribute.name: mirrorType
attribute.description: This region's mirror type.

attribute.name: dataPolicy
attribute.description: This region's data policy.

attribute.name: scope
attribute.description: This region's scope.

attribute.name: initialCapacity
attribute.description: This region's initial capacity.

attribute.name: loadFactor
attribute.description: This region's load factor.

attribute.name: concurrencyLevel
attribute.description: This region's concurrency level.

attribute.name: statisticsEnabled
attribute.description: True if statistics are enabled on this region.

attribute.name: persistBackup
attribute.description: true if the contents of the region are persisted to disk

attribute.name: earlyAck
attribute.description: false if ack is sent after processing update; true if sent early

attribute.name: diskWriteAttributes
attribute.description: Description of how the region's contents is written to disk

attribute.name: diskDirs
attribute.description: Directories to which the region's contents are written

attribute.name: entryCount
attribute.description: Number of entries in this region.

attribute.name: subregionCount
attribute.description: Number of subregions in this region.

attribute.name: lastModifiedTime
attribute.description: Last time an entry's value in this region or one of its subregions was modified.

attribute.name: lastAccessedTime
attribute.description: Last time an entry in this region or one of its subregions was accessed.

attribute.name: hitCount
attribute.description: Number of times that a get on this region found a local value.

attribute.name: missCount
attribute.description: Number of times that a get on this region did not find a local value.

attribute.name: hitRatio
attribute.description: Ratio of hits to total get calls.

attribute.name: subregionNames
attribute.description: A set of the names of each subregion of this region.

attribute.name: subregionFullPaths
attribute.description: A set of the full paths of each subregion of this region.

attribute.name: membershipAttributes
attribute.description: Description of the region's membership attributes.

attribute.name: subscriptionAttributes
attribute.description: Description of the region's subscription attributes.

attribute.name: partitionAttributes
attribute.description: Description of the region's partition attributes.

attribute.name: concurrencyChecksEnabled
attribute.description: True if concurrent modifications are handled on this region.

operation.name: refresh
operation.description: Updates each attribute in this MBean.

operation.name: getCacheListeners
operation.description: Descriptions of all CacheListeners on this region as a String array. If there are no cacheListeners defined on the region an empty array is returned.

mbean.name: SystemMemberCacheServer
mbean.description: View of a GemFire system member's cache server

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: The port on which this cache server listens for clients.

attribute.name: bindAddress
attribute.description: The address on which this cache server listens for clients.

attribute.name: hostnameForClients
attribute.description: The host name or ip address that will be given to clients who discover this cache server

attribute.name: notifyBySubscription
attribute.description: Whether or not this cache server should notify clients based on key subscription.

attribute.name: socketBufferSize
attribute.description: The socket buffer size in bytes for connections made by clients to this server.

attribute.name: maximumTimeBetweenPings
attribute.description: The maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, between pinging a client to determine its health.

attribute.name: maxConnections
attribute.description: The maxium number of client connections allowed by this server.

attribute.name: maxThreads
attribute.description: The maxium number of threads allowed in this server to service client requests.

attribute.name: maximumMessageCount
attribute.description: The maximum number of messages that can be enqueued in a client-queue on this server.

attribute.name: messageTimeToLive
attribute.description: The time, in seconds, after which a message in a client-queue on this server will expire.

attribute.name: groups
attribute.description: The list of server groups that this cache server belongs to.

attribute.name: loadPollInterval
attribute.description: The period, in milliseconds, to test the load for this cache server using the load probe

attribute.name: loadProbe
attribute.description: The period, in milliseconds, to test the load for this cache server using the load probe

attribute.name: running
attribute.description: True if cache server is running.

operation.name: start
operation.description: Starts the cache server.

operation.name: stop
operation.description: Stops the cache server.

operation.name: refresh
operation.description: Updates each attribute in this MBean.

mbean.name: CacheVm
mbean.description: A dedicated Server VM that contains a GemFire Cache

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: A string that uniquely identifies the cache vm.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The JMX ObjectName of this managed resource.

attribute.name: host
attribute.description: The host machine on which the cache vm is running.

attribute.name: refreshInterval
attribute.description: The interval (in seconds) between auto-refreshes of this application;s configuration attributes, as defined in the gemfire.properties file. To disable the JMX Timer service's auto-refresh feature, set this attribute to zero or less.

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: Display GemFire version information.

attribute.name: hasCache
attribute.description: Does the cache vm host a GemFire Cache?

attribute.name: distributedMember
attribute.description: Distributed membership identity.

attribute.name: productDirectory
attribute.description: The location of the GemFire installation used to run this cache vm.

attribute.name: workingDirectory
attribute.description: The directory in which the cache vm was launched.

attribute.name: running
attribute.description: True if this cache vm is running.

attribute.name: cacheXMLFile
attribute.description: The declarative caching file user to configure this cache vm.

attribute.name: classPath
attribute.description: Location(s) of user classes required by cache vm

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.created
notification.description: A cache got created on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.closed
notification.description: A cache is closed on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.region.created
notification.description: A region is created in a cache on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.region.lost
notification.description: A region was removed from a cache on a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.client.joined
notification.description: A cache client established a connection with a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.client.left
notification.description: A cache client gracefully closed a connection with a member of this distributed system.

notification.name: gemfire.distributedsystem.cache.client.crashed
notification.description: A cache client crashed and abruptly lost connection with a member of this distributed system.

operation.name: getRoles
operation.description: Get the membership roles filled by this member.

operation.name: start
operation.description: Start this cache vm.

operation.name: waitToStart
operation.description: Wait for the cache vm to start

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Number of milliseconds to wait to start

operation.name: waitToStop
operation.description: Wait for the cache vm to stop

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Number of milliseconds to wait to stop

operation.name: stop
operation.description: Stop this cache vm.

operation.name: getLog
operation.description: Display the log for this cache vm.

operation.name: getLicense
operation.description: Display GemFire licensing information.

operation.name: manageCache
operation.description: Create a SystemMemberCache MBean for the cache in this cache vm.

operation.name: manageStats
operation.description: Create a StatisticResource MBean for each statistic resource in this member.

operation.name: manageStat
operation.description: Create a StatisticResource MBean for each statistic resource in this member, given the underlying Statistics Type name.

parameter.name: statisticsTypeName
parameter.description: Name of the underlying Statistics Type eg. DistributionStats

operation.name: refreshConfig
operation.description: Refresh configuration attributes for this application, using the gemfire.properties file.

operation.name: getConfiguration
operation.description: Returns the current configuration attributes for this application, using the gemfire.properties file.

attribute.name: health
attribute.description: The overall health of the distributed system: Good, Okay, or Poor.

attribute.name: healthStatus
attribute.description: The current status of the overall health of GemFire

operation.name: resetHealth
operation.description: Resets the overall health of the distributed system to Good (optimal).

operation.name: getDiagnosis
operation.description: Returns a description of any causes of ill health in the distributed system.

operation.name: manageGemFireHealthConfig
operation.description: Registers a new GemFireHealthConfig MBean and returns its ObjectName

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The host to monitor the health of

mbean.name: DistributedSystemHealthConfig
mbean.description: Configures how the health of a distributed system is determined

attribute.name: maxDepartedApplications
attribute.description: The maximum number of system members that can unexpectedly leave a healthy distributed system.

operation.name: applyChanges
operation.description: Applies these configuration attributes to the GemFire health monitor.

mbean.name: GemFireHealthConfig
mbean.description: Configures how the health of GemFire components is determined

attribute.name: healthEvaluationInterval
attribute.description: The number of seconds to wait between two health assessments of this distributed system.

attribute.name: maxNetSearchTime
attribute.description: The maximum time (in milliseconds) that a netSearch operation can take before the cache member is considered to be unhealthy.

attribute.name: maxLoadTime
attribute.description: The maximum time (in milliseconds) that a cache load operation can take before the cache member is considered to be unhealthy.

attribute.name: minHitRatio
attribute.description: The minimum hit ratio in order for a cache member to be considered healthy.

attribute.name: maxEventQueueSize
attribute.description: The maximum number of entries in the event delivery queue of a healthy cache member.

attribute.name: maxVMProcessSize
attribute.description: The maximum process size (in megabytes) of a healthy member of the distributed system.

attribute.name: maxMessageQueueSize
attribute.description: The maximum number of enqueued incoming or outgoing messages that a healthy member of a distributed system can have.

attribute.name: maxReplyTimeouts
attribute.description: The maximum number of message replies that can time out in a healthy member.

operation.name: applyChanges
operation.description: Applies this configuration to the GemFire health monitor.
